const FINAL_PROMPT = `
  ### QUERY FORMAT ###
  - Query format uses the XML tags <INTERNAL-NOTE /> and <USER-QUERY /> to separate internal notes from user queries.
  - An optional <CONTEXT /> tag can be used to provide additional context to the AI agent.
  - Internal notes are used to provide additional context to the AI agent, and are not visible to the user.

  ### INSTRUCTIONS ###
  ${this.prompt}`;
